page.title: 14HANDICAP CENTRE, HENLLAN (2)
page.content:
The Adult Handicapped Training Centre has acquired some renown:
(a) Workshop trainees produce fine rustic furniture (benches,tables,) which is sold to the public.The proceeds go to the County.Trainees receive a weekly wage of Â£1.50_Â£4.
(b) Centre has an impressive garden & greenhouse(banana plant and all). Green-fingered students have been commissioned to undertake the flo- ral arrangements for the National Eisteddfod at Rhyl in August 1985. Centre will provide 8000 shrubs.
(c) July 1985 five trainees represent- ed the U.K.in the Special Olympics at Dublin. They won a silver and two bronze medals for their per- formance in track events.
